title: Sincerely,
description: In F.s. Yousaf's second book, he brilliantly compiles letters and love poems into a small book that truly defines the meaning of how much a person can mean to another. This is very different from his first collection, as this one only carries positivity and hope for a better tomorrow. Prepare yourself to be smitten by this collection.
author: F.S. Yousaf
